A journey towards genuine intelligence

Next generation augmented reality experiences

About Us

Genutel is an early stage startup exploring augmented reality interactions for merging personality archetypes with business analytics to provide a more natural way to visualize potential and current customers.

We are based out of Troy, New York, and San Francisco, California.

The Future Is Now

With the convergence of many technologies being offered at low-cost by many companies competing at the frontier, we are truly in a special time. Computing and sensors are getting cheaper while algorithms are getting more capable and powerful.

"A number of organizations, us and others, have just amazing computer vision technology, doing things that seemed impossible even a year ago."

Andrew Ng Chief Scientist - Baidu

"If you look into the future, there are going to be step-function changes in artificial intelligence that will affect business models and business opportunities."

Jeff Holden Chief Product Officer - Uber

"So the basic human senses like seeing, hearing, language, core things that we do. I think it's possible to get to the point in the next five to 10 years where we have computer systems that are better than people at each of those things."

Mark Zuckerberg CEO - Facebook

"We are really rapidly approaching the amount of computational power we need to be able to do some interesting things in AI."

D. Scott Phoenix CEO - Vicarious
